Entity.Description: This table stores customer definitions as defined by an organization for a buyer organization, a receiving node, or a consumer.
Entity.Name: Customer

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_ID

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the type of customer. Default value is Consumer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Type

Attribute.Description: The organization code of organization that defines this customer.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization code of buyer.
Attribute.Name: Buyer_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The classification code of customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Classification_Code

Attribute.Description: This is the ID issued by Customer to the vendor.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Assigned_Vendor_ID

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the customer's rewards number
Attribute.Name: Customer_Rewards_No

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the customer can be scheduled against the supplemental capacity. Default value is N.
Attribute.Name: Can_Consume_Suppl_Capacity

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the slot preference type of the customer. Default value is NONE.
Attribute.Name: Slot_Preference_Type

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the parent customer.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: The external identifier for the customer.
Attribute.Name: External_Customer_ID

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the customer has to be sent functional acknowledgment.
Attribute.Name: Sends_Func_Ack

Attribute.Description: Hours taken to send functional acknowledgement to the customer.
Attribute.Name: Func_Ack_Time

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the customer has to be sent commitment against a purchase order.
Attribute.Name: Sends_Commitment

Attribute.Description: Hours taken to send commitment to the customer.
Attribute.Name: Commitment_Time

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the customer has to be sent an advance ship notice.
Attribute.Name: Sends_Asn

Attribute.Description: Indicates maximum number of users or teams that can be assigned to manage this customer.
Attribute.Name: Max_Assign_Reps_Or_Teams

Attribute.Description: The date and time when the user was registered or when registration goes into effect. Default: current timestamp.
Attribute.Name: Registered_Date

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last update to this customer entity. Hangoff tables included.
Attribute.Name: Max_Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp of the last modification performed on a remote system.
Attribute.Name: Remote_Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last synchronization of this record.
Attribute.Name: Syncts

Attribute.Description: Indicates number of users currently assigned to this customer.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_Reps

Attribute.Description: Indicates a vertical of a customer.
Attribute.Name: Vertical

Attribute.Description: Indicates a level a customer has achieved.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Level

Attribute.Description: Indicates the type of a customer.
Attribute.Name: Relationship_Type

Attribute.Description: Indicates a status on a customer.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The root customer in a customer's hierarchy.
Attribute.Name: Root_Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores contact information of a customer.
Entity.Name: Customer_Contact

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this customer has a user contact.
Attribute.Name: User_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_ID

Attribute.Description: The title for the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Title

Attribute.Description: The first name of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: First_Name

Attribute.Description: The middle name of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Middle_Name

Attribute.Description: The last name of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Last_Name

Attribute.Description: The email address of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: EmailID

Attribute.Description: The company of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Company

Attribute.Description: The day time phone of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Day_Phone

Attribute.Description: The evening phone of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Evening_Phone

Attribute.Description: The mobile phone of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Mobile_Phone

Attribute.Description: The day time fax of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Day_Fax_No

Attribute.Description: The evening fax of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Evening_Fax_No

Attribute.Description: The date of birth of the contact person.
Attribute.Name: Dob

Attribute.Description: The date of birth of the contact person's spouse.
Attribute.Name: Spouse_Dob

Attribute.Description: The wedding anniversary date.
Attribute.Name: Wedding_Aniversary

Attribute.Description: This is the currency for spending limit. If not passed, for a Business customer, it will be defaulted to the customer's Buyer Organization's Locale Currency.
Attribute.Name: Spending_Limit_Currency

Attribute.Description: The maximum total order amount that can be placed by this customer contact in the role of a buyer.
Attribute.Name: Spending_Limit

Attribute.Description: This is the user who can approve/reject hold when order is beyond the buyer user's spending limit. This user must be a valid customer contact.
Attribute.Name: Approver_User_Id

Attribute.Description: This is the user who can approve/reject hold when the user is unavailable. This user must be a valid customer contact.
Attribute.Name: Approver_Proxy_User_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates a department which customer contact belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Department

Attribute.Description: Indicates a contact's job title.
Attribute.Name: Job_Title

Attribute.Description: Indicates a status on a customer contact.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores additional addresses of a customer.
Entity.Name: Customer_Additional_Address

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER_ADDNL_ADDRESS table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Additional_Address_Key

Attribute.Description: The customer that the additional address belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for a customer additional address.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Additional_Address_ID

Attribute.Description: The type of address.
Attribute.Name: Address_Type

Attribute.Description: Link to the YFS_PERSON_INFO table that stores the actual address information.
Attribute.Name: Person_Info_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is used as a shipping address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Ship_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is used as a billing address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Bill_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is used as a Sold To address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Sold_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is a default shipping address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default_Ship_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is a default billing address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default_Bill_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates if an address is a default Sold To address.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default_Sold_To

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this address belongs to a specific customer contact who is associated with this customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores preferred day-of-week and time slots preference for customers.
Entity.Name: Customer_Slot_Preference

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER_SLOT_PREFERENCE table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Slot_Preference_Key

Attribute.Description: The customer who defined this slot preference.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: The start time of the preferred slot.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: The end time of the preferred slot.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Sunday.
Attribute.Name: Sunday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Monday.
Attribute.Name: Monday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Tuesday.
Attribute.Name: Tuesday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Wednesday.
Attribute.Name: Wednesday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Thursday.
Attribute.Name: Thursday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Friday.
Attribute.Name: Friday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: The flag indicates that the specified time slot is preferred on Saturday.
Attribute.Name: Saturday_Preferred

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores customer preferences for scheduling orders.
Entity.Name: Customer_Sch_Preference

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER_SCH_PREFERENCE table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Sch_Preference_Key

Attribute.Description: The customer who defined scheduling preferences.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete order needs to be shipped.
Attribute.Name: Is_Ship_Complete

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the complete line needs to be shipped.
Attribute.Name: Is_Line_Ship_Complete

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order needs to be shipped from a single ship node.
Attribute.Name: Is_Ship_Single_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order line needs to be shipped from a single ship node.
Attribute.Name: Is_Line_Ship_Single_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order needs to be cancelled in case of inventory shortage.
Attribute.Name: Cancel_Order_On_Excp_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item can be substituted if inventory is not available.
Attribute.Name: Is_Substitution_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether it is allowed to schedule against the node that requires drop ship chained order creation.
Attribute.Name: Is_Drop_Ship_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This value indicates whether customer wants to optimize on date or minimize number of shipments.
Attribute.Name: Optimization_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores payment methods of a customer.
Entity.Name: Customer_Payment_Method

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the CUSTOMER_PAYMENT_METHOD table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Payment_Method_Key

Attribute.Description: The customer, who maintains this payment method.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this payment method belongs to a specific customer contact who is associated with this customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_Key

Attribute.Description: The payment type of this payment method.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: The account number of the customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Account_No

Attribute.Description: The four digits of the customer account number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the customer account number.
Attribute.Name: Display_Customer_Account_No

Attribute.Description: The credit card type.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_Type

Attribute.Description: The credit card name.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_Name

Attribute.Description: The first name of the credit card holder.
Attribute.Name: First_Name

Attribute.Description: The middle name of the credit card holder.
Attribute.Name: Middle_Name

Attribute.Description: The last name of the credit card holder.
Attribute.Name: Last_Name

Attribute.Description: The credit card number.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: The four digits of the credit card number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the credit card number.
Attribute.Name: Display_Credit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: The expiration date of the credit card.
Attribute.Name: Credit_Card_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: This will store the primary account number of the debit card payment type.
Attribute.Name: Debit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: The four digits of the debit card number that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the debit card number.
Attribute.Name: Display_Debit_Card_No

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 1.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_1

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 2.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_2

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 3.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_3

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 4.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_4

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 5.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_5

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 6.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_6

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 7.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_7

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 8.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_8

Attribute.Description: The payment reference 9.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Reference_9

Attribute.Description: The four digits of the payment reference 1 that should be displayed. If not passed, it is defaulted to be the last four digits of the payment reference 1.
Attribute.Name: Display_Payment_Ref_1

Attribute.Description: The amount a customer can spend before they have to settle their account This is only valid for PaymentType Customer Account, and is only used when the Payment Rule used specifies Customer Accoutns are tracked internally. Orders will be placed on hold if the order total is more than the available account balance. An AccountLimit specified for a CustomerContact is not used by the Order Fulfillment system.
Attribute.Name: Account_Limit

Attribute.Description: Currency in which account limit for customer account is specified.
Attribute.Name: Account_Limit_Currency

Attribute.Description: Determines if this payment is the default for the customer or customer contact.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default_Payment

Attribute.Description: Link to the YFS_PERSON_INFO table that stores the actual address information.
Attribute.Name: Person_Info_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table contains customer grade assignments for a range of customer rating.
Entity.Name: Customer_Grade

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_CUSTOMER_GRADE table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Grade_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization code that owns the grade.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The minimum rating value for the grade.
Attribute.Name: Minimum_Rating

Attribute.Description: The maximum rating value for the grade.
Attribute.Name: Maximum_Rating

Attribute.Description: The grade code assigned for the range values between MINIMUM_RATING and MAXIMUM_RATING.
Attribute.Name: Grade_Code

Attribute.Description: The description for the grade code.
Attribute.Name: Grade_Description

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: The table stores the customer information like customer grade information for a customer, from an external BI system. This table is meant for either direct data upload through custom BI system or can also be updated using the managecustomer api. If this table is inserted or updated through direct db update (ETL), no events will be raised.
Entity.Name: Customer_Analytics

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_CUSTOMER_ANALYTICS table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Analytics_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization code that owns the grade.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_ID

Attribute.Description: The grade code assigned for the range values between MINIMUM_RATING and MAXIMUM_RATING.
Attribute.Name: Grade_Code

Attribute.Description: The description for the grade code.
Attribute.Name: Grade_Description

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores all customer subscriptions in the system.
Entity.Name: Customer_Subscription

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CUSTOMER_SUBSCRIPTION table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Subscription_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_ID

Attribute.Description: The organization code of organization that defines this customer.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The number of the subscription.
Attribute.Name: Subscription_No

Attribute.Description: The E-mail ID of the customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Emailid

Attribute.Description: This is the customer contact ID for the subscription. This field maps to contact ID field of YFS_Customer_Contact.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Contact_ID

Attribute.Description: The seller organization that is associated with this subscription. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The name given to the subscription.
Attribute.Name: Subscription_Name

Attribute.Description: The date that the subscription was created.
Attribute.Name: Subscription_Date

Attribute.Description: The date on which the subscription period started.
Attribute.Name: Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The end date of the subscription.
Attribute.Name: End_Date

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The description of the item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Description

Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Short_Description

Attribute.Description: This field indicates what kind of item is on the order line.
Attribute.Name: Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The quantity of the line item that has been subscribed.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The status of the subscription.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The type of the subscription.
Attribute.Name: Subscription_Type

Attribute.Description: Subscription key of the new subscription created from this subscription.
Attribute.Name: Associated_Subscription_Key

Attribute.Description: The collection of items that form a unit. For example, a home theatre system is a unit consisting of kit components, such as a DVD player, TV, CD player, etc.
Attribute.Name: Kit_Code

Attribute.Description: The Bundle parent's subscription key. If this line is a bundle component, this key will point to the parent subscription.
Attribute.Name: Bundle_Parent_Subscription_Key

Attribute.Description: The quantity that is used to compute ordered quantity for bundle component line. It can be specified only for bundle components. If specified ordered quantity will be set to KitQty*OrderedQty of the bundle parent.
Attribute.Name: Kit_Qty

Attribute.Description: This field is used by Sterling Multi-Channel Selling Solution so that Visual Modeler can be opened with existing options.
Attribute.Name: Bom_Config_Key

Attribute.Description: The unit price for the order line.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Price

Attribute.Description: the list price of the item. This is an informational field.
Attribute.Name: List_Price

Attribute.Description: The grand total for the subscription.
Attribute.Name: Total_Amount

Attribute.Description: The currency code in which this subscription is processed. All price fields are assumed to be in this currency.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Maintains details of various Price Types applicable to a subscription
Entity.Name: Customer_Subscription_Price

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of the YFS_CUSTOMER_SUB_PRICE table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Subscription_Price_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of the YFS_CUSTOMER_SUBSCRIPTION table.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Subscription_Key

Attribute.Description: Price Type associated with this record.
Attribute.Name: Price_Type_Name

Attribute.Description: Recurring Interval for Price Type; if null, then Price Type is non-recurring.
Attribute.Name: Recurring_Type

Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate that his Price Type is for informational use only.
Attribute.Name: Is_Price_Type_For_Information_Only

Attribute.Description: Price value of the corresponding Price Type.
Attribute.Name: Price

Attribute.Description: The date from which the price type is applicable.
Attribute.Name: Price_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The end date of this price type.
Attribute.Name: Price_End_Date

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
